name: Bush Dependency
description:
Bush Dependency is a survival, exploration and exploitation game.

Currently, it is in pre-alpha and we are slowly adding systems and features to the game. 

With update .11 we added plants (randomly placed objects) and biomes!

Current Biomes:

- Plains (most common!)

- Desert (second most common)

- Shadow (weirdo biome)

- Forest (unfinished, has a ore coming in the .15 update)

Next update is fluid and temperature mechanics.

Links:

Trello Board is here: https://trello.com/b/RCoZ57IT/bush-dependency

Ask Questions here if you are a gamer:

https://redd.it/7sgfzs

Ask Questions here (outdated) : https://www.reddit.com/r/gamedev/comments/7qcedq/working_on_a_new_game_its_a_2d_...

or on the Discussion Board.

Finally, if you have any feedback, bugs or other stuff you want to tell/ask us about, please do on the discussion board as we welcome any feedback and/or bug reports.

Note: Screenshots will come when the game has improved graphics instead of blocks of colour.
